gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pelicans 107, Bucks 100
gameRecap.excerpt: New Orleans defeats Milwaukee, 107-100. For New Orleans, Zion Williamson led the way with 28 points and five rebounds while aided by CJ McCollum (25 points, seven rebounds, seven assists) and Jonas Valanciunas (17 points, 10 rebounds) in the victory. Giannis Antetokounmpo finished with 35 points and 14 rebounds with Malik Beasley adding 20 points (six 3PM) and Damian Lillard tallying 20 points, five rebounds, seven assists for Milwaukee in the losing effort. New Orleans improves to 45-28, while Milwaukee moves to 46-27 in the loss.
